name: smarteyecare-root
description: Root scripts to run SmartEyeCare frontend and backend together

scripts.setup: python -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "python backend/app.py" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start:wait: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "python backend/app.py" "wait-on http://localhost:5000/api/health && npm run dev --prefix frontend"
